thread.title: Birmingham City fan convinced by his pals that he needs passport for away game… at Cardiff!
thread.title_full: Birmingham City fan convinced by his pals that he needs passport for away game… at Cardiff!

author: Richard Innes
title: Birmingham City fan convinced by his pals that he needs passport for away game… at Cardiff!
text:
Birmingham City fan convinced by his pals that he needs passport for away game… at Cardiff! One Bluenose is made to look very, very silly by his mischievous mates Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Birmingham fan ridiculed for taking passport to Cardiff away Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Something tells us Aston Villa fans are going to enjoy this one. 
One unfortunate Birmingham City supporter has inadvertently given Villans all sorts of ammunition when it comes to slating their rivals… by showing a frightening lack of geographical knowledge. 
As reported by our friends at the Birmingham Mail, the clip you can see above shows a group of Bluesnoses on their way to an away game. 
An away game in Cardiff. That's Cardiff, the city in Wales. Oh mate Oh MATE 
Wales is not in England… therefore a passport is needed to cross the border and get to the Welsh capital. Right? 
Erm, not exactly. However, these mischievous Birmingham boys still managed to convince their gullible pal to pack his passport for the journey. 
Lukas Jutkiewicz scored a late equaliser to cancel out a goal from Joe Ralls and earn Blues a point against Neil Warnock's side. Cardiff v Birmingham: to clarify, a match that was played in the UK (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
The last gasp leveller probably produced the second biggest cheer of the day from these particular fans - the first, of course, was reserved for the moment they pestered their pal into showing his passport. 
Watch the video above, courtesy of Football Away Days , to see it. Like us on Facebook
